title: He Wei Dao x Re:Cong Ling Kaishi de Yi Shijie Shenghuo
content:
What did I expect from an advertisement?

Commercial collaborations with popular Anime shows are nothing new, especially in recent years, and of course, Re:Zero is THAT big. While not the best Anime-collab ad I've seen, this one seems to be on the strong side. It features a good product and one that you could see Subaru actually discussing.

The art and minimal animation were decent, I'd say better than it had the right to be. The skits also worked, even better than those dumb Picture Dramas. I would have taken extra episodes, weird to admit.

I was yearning for Ram to say my favorite Barusu word, but man,I was left on edge.
